channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 9 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 9 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - alias_number_change
item.description: =1 If number of alias exposures changed Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 If number of alias exposures changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79ASL Description LENGTH OF DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79ASN Description NUMBER OF DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79ASS Description OFFSET TO DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cmb_data_invalid
item.description: =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - command_response_time
item.description: =1 Initial command response time available Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 Initial command response time available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - data_invalid
item.description: DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DCL Description LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DCN Description NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DCS Description OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - device_data_incomplete
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Incomplete device data due to too many devices Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - device_ficon
item.description: Device connected to FICON Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cn2 Description Device connected to FICON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cn2.

item.title: Field - device_time_invalid
item.description: =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - ecmb_mode
item.description: =1 ECMB mode Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 ECMB mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - goal_mode
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description System is in GOAL mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - hyperpav_base_device
item.description: =1 HyperPAV base device Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 HyperPAV base device Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - interrupt_delay_time
item.description: =1 Interrupt delay time available Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 Interrupt delay time available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_data
item.description: inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79MCL Description LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79MCN Description NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79MCS Description OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - model_data_inavaliable_stsch
item.description: =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - mounted_volume_sn
item.description: VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER OF MOUNTED VOLUME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SER Description VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER OF MOUNTED VOLUME

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - no_lcud_info
item.description: =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - online_interval_end
item.description: =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - parallel_access_vol
item.description: =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - qlength_invalid
item.description: =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79QSL Description LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79QSN Description NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79QSS Description OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - r799alc
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS ALLOCATED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799ALC Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS ALLOCATED

item.title: Field - r799atv
item.description: FUNCTION ACTIV TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799ATV Description FUNCTION ACTIV TIME

item.title: Field - r799cfc
item.description: Device connected to FICON Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cn2 Description Device connected to FICON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cn2.

item.title: Field - r799cmb
item.description: =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - r799cmr
item.description: Command response time in units of 128 microseconds Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CMR Description Command response time in units of 128 microseconds

item.title: Field - r799cn2
item.description: Device flag extension 2 Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CN2 Description Device flag extension 2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description device_ficon 0 Device connected to FICON

item.title: Field - r799cnf
item.description: DEVICE FLAGS Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CNF Description DEVICE FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qlength_invalid 0 =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID no_lcud_info 1 =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION cmb_data_invalid 2 =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID device_time_invalid 3 =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID data_invalid 6 DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION online_interval_end 7 =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL

item.title: Field - r799cnn
item.description: DEVICE CONNECT TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CNN Description DEVICE CONNECT TIME

item.title: Field - r799cnx
item.description: Device flag extension Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CNX Description Device flag extension Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description parallel_access_vol 0 =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume alias_number_change 1 =1 If number of alias exposures changed timing_inactive 2 Timing facility not active ecmb_mode 3 =1 ECMB mode model_data_inavaliable_stsch 4 =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH command_response_time 5 =1 Initial command response time available hyperpav_base_device 6 =1 HyperPAV base device interrupt_delay_time 7 =1 Interrupt delay time available

item.title: Field - r799cuq
item.description: Control Unit Queuing Time Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CUQ Description Control Unit Queuing Time

item.title: Field - r799dis
item.description: DEVICE DISCONNECT TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799DIS Description DEVICE DISCONNECT TIME

item.title: Field - r799dtf
item.description: =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - r799dvb
item.description: device busy delay time (3090,9021,9121,9221 support) Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799DVB Description device busy delay time (3090,9021,9121,9221 support)

item.title: Field - r799ecm
item.description: =1 ECMB mode Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 ECMB mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799fcm
item.description: =1 Initial command response time available Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 Initial command response time available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799fid
item.description: =1 Interrupt delay time available Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 Interrupt delay time available Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799hpv
item.description: =1 HyperPAV base device Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 HyperPAV base device Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799idt
item.description: Interrupt delay time in units of 128 microseconds. This field is zero if not supported by the hardware. Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799IDT Description Interrupt delay time in units of 128 microseconds. This field is zero if not supported by the hardware.

item.title: Field - r799ios
item.description: IOS Queue time in microseconds Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799IOS Description IOS Queue time in microseconds

item.title: Field - r799lcd
item.description: =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - r799lcu
item.description: LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT NUMBER Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799LCU Description LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT NUMBER

item.title: Field - r799mec
item.description: MEASUREMENT EVENT COUNT (NUMBER OF SSCH FOR WHICH CONNECT, PENDING, AND ACTIVE TIME WERE STORED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799MEC Description MEASUREMENT EVENT COUNT (NUMBER OF SSCH FOR WHICH CONNECT, PENDING, AND ACTIVE TIME WERE STORED

item.title: Field - r799nda
item.description: Total number of allocations in effect for the device Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NDA Description Total number of allocations in effect for the device

item.title: Field - r799nm2
item.description: Device number same as R799NUM Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NM2 Description Device number same as R799NUM

item.title: Field - r799ntf
item.description: Timing facility not active Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description Timing facility not active Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799num
item.description: DEVICE NUMBER Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NUM Description DEVICE NUMBER

item.title: Field - r799nux
item.description: Number of exposures (if multiple). In case of a HyperPAV base device, R799HPV = 1, number of accumulated HyperPAV aliases Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NUX Description Number of exposures (if multiple). In case of a HyperPAV base device, R799HPV = 1, number of accumulated HyperPAV aliases

item.title: Field - r799nxc
item.description: =1 If number of alias exposures changed Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 If number of alias exposures changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799pav
item.description: =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799pct
item.description: Number of unsuccessful PAV samples Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799PCT Description Number of unsuccessful PAV samples

item.title: Field - r799pen
item.description: FUNCTION PENDING TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799PEN Description FUNCTION PENDING TIME

item.title: Field - r799psm
item.description: Number of successful PAV samples Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799PSM Description Number of successful PAV samples

item.title: Field - r799que
item.description: NUMBER OF REQUESTS QUEUED IN IOS FOR THIS DEVICE Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799QUE Description NUMBER OF REQUESTS QUEUED IN IOS FOR THIS DEVICE

item.title: Field - r799qul
item.description: =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - r799rsv
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799RSV Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED

item.title: Field - r799scs
item.description: Subchannel set the device is situated Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SCS Description Subchannel set the device is situated

item.title: Field - r799ssc
item.description: START SUBCHANNEL (SSCH) COUNT Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SSC Description START SUBCHANNEL (SSCH) COUNT

item.title: Field - r799sta
item.description: =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - r799sts
item.description: =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - r799typ
item.description: UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP FIELD Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799TYP Description UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP FIELD

item.title: Field - r799utl
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES WHEN THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED, BUT AN SSCH HAD NOT BEEN ISSUED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799UTL Description NUMBER OF SAMPLES WHEN THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED, BUT AN SSCH HAD NOT BEEN ISSUED

item.title: Field - r799vac
item.description: DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Description DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT Description Command text

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL Description Length of command text

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT Description Default DR text

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL Description Length default DR text

item.title: Field - r79goal
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description System is in GOAL mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Time when the call to data gatherer was issued Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD Description Time when the call to data gatherer was issued

item.title: Field - r79inv
item.description: inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST Description Monitor I interval start time

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK Description Token returned from IWMRCOLL service

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Description Flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description relocate_section_deficient 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering report_sorted_sg 1 Report sorted by SG rsm_data_invalid 2 Invalid RSM data obtained goal_mode 3 System is in GOAL mode tranx_data_invalid 4 Invalid transaction data srm_mode_changed 5 SRM mode changed invalid_data 6 inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) device_data_incomplete 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79maxd
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Incomplete device data due to too many devices Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT Description Number of data sections in following small records

item.title: Field - r79par
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID Description Measurement name

item.title: Field - r79rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid RSM data obtained Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES Description Session name

item.title: Field - r79sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Report sorted by SG Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79srmc
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description SRM mode changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT Description Total number of data sections in large record

item.title: Field - r79trxi
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid transaction data Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR Description Total number of small records

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER Description User field

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - reassembly_area
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - relocate_section_deficient
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - report_sorted_sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Report sorted by SG Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rsm_data_invalid
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid RSM data obtained Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - sorage_group
item.description: Storage Group Name Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SGN Description Storage Group Name

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - srm_mode_changed
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description SRM mode changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S9 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - timing_inactive
item.description: Timing facility not active Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Description Timing facility not active Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - tranx_data_invalid
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid transaction data Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
